messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Child's temperament
messages.msgSnippet: Christian alert! The only book I ve read like this is _Raising Christians Not Just Children_ (I think) formerly titled _Raising the Curtain on Raising
messages.messageBody:
Christian alert!

The only book I've read like this is _Raising Christians Not Just Children_
(I think) formerly titled _Raising the Curtain on Raising Children_

Another book I really like is _Positive Personality Profiles_

HTH

:-) Diane

> Does any one have any book recommendations or even
> better online websites or resources I can check out on temperaments
> especially in children.

messages.subject: Child's temperament
messages.msgSnippet: How annoying I must be with all of my off the topic questions?  I have a mothering kind of question for you.  I am really interested in finding about my
messages.messageBody:
How annoying I must be with all of my "off the topic" questions? I have
a mothering kind of question for you. I am really interested in finding
about my child's temperament. I have a sneaky suspicion that we may be
on opposite ends of the spectrum. I know an awful lot about learning
styles but I am more interested in getting the core of my dd and what
makes her tick. Does any one have any book recommendations or even
better online websites or resources I can check out on temperaments
especially in children. My girlfriend recommended a great site with a
"test" and everything but it was definitely aimed at adults. Any
suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
Caroline
